cocktails.garnish: Sprinkle fresh ground nutmeg on top.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Alexander

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with half orange slice and a lemon zest.
cocktails.method: Mix the ingredients directly in an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of Soda Water. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: Americano

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Angel Face

cocktails.garnish: Optional Maraschino Cherry.
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Aviation

cocktails.garnish: Pineapple and Cherry, optional mint sprig for additional aroma.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the Prosecco, shake well with ice, strain into chilled highball glass filled with ice and top up with Prosecco.
cocktails.name: Barracuda

cocktails.garnish: Optionally garnish with a lemon or orange zest.
cocktails.method: Stir honey with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Bee’s Knees

cocktails.method: Pour peach puree into the mixing glass with ice, add the Prosecco wine. Stir gently and pour in a chilled flute glass.
cocktails.name: Bellini
cocktails.note: PUCCINI - Fresh Mandarin Orange Juice; ROSSINI - Fresh Strawberry Puree; TINTORETTO - Fresh Pomegranate Juice.

cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Between the Sheets

cocktails.method: Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: Black Russian
cocktails.note: WHITE RUSSIAN - Float fresh cream on the top and stir in slowly.

cocktails.garnish: Celery, Lemon Wedge (Optional)
cocktails.method: Stir gently all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, pour into rocks glass.
cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.note: If requested served with ice, pour into highball glass.

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with orange zest, optionally a lemon zest.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Boulevardier

cocktails.garnish: Garnish optionally with a lemon slice and blackberries.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the Crème de Mûre, shake well with ice, strain into chilled old fashioned glass filled with crushed ice, then pour the blackberry liqueur (Crème de Mûre) over the top of the drink, in a circular motion.
cocktails.name: Bramble

cocktails.garnish: Rub a slice of orange (or lemon) around the rim of the glass and dip it in pulverized white sugar, so that the sugar will adhere to the edge of the glass. Carefully curling place the orange/lemon peel around the inside of the glass.
cocktails.method: Mix together all ingredients with ice cubes in a mixing glass and strain into prepared slim cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Brandy Crusta

cocktails.method: Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Cachaça. Stir gently to involve ingredients.
cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.note: CAIPIROSKA - Instead of Cachaça use Vodka;

cocktails.garnish: Lime wedge.
cocktails.method: Mix honey with water and lime juice and spread the mixture on the bottom and sides of the glass. Add cracked ice, and then the rum. End by energetically stirring from bottom to top.
cocktails.name: Canchanchara

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with lemon zest and a maraschino cherry.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktails shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled rocks glass with ice.
cocktails.name: Casino

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with orange zest and maraschino cherry.
cocktails.method: Place the sugar cube with 2 dashes of bitters in a large Champagne glass, add the cognac. Pour gently chilled Champagne.
cocktails.name: Champagne Cocktail

cocktails.garnish: Fresh raspberries.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktails shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Clover Club

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with orange zest
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain in chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Corpse Reviver #2

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a lemon twist.
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with lime wedge.
cocktails.method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
cocktails.name: Cuba Libre

cocktails.method: In a cocktail shaker add all ingredients. Stir well to dissolve the sugar. Add ice and shake. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Daiquiri

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a lime wedge or slice.
cocktails.method: In a highball glass filled with ice pour the ginger beer and top floating with the Rum.
cocktails.name: Dark ‘n’ stormy

cocktails.garnish: Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with green olives if requested.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Dry Martini

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Espresso Martini

cocktails.method: Pour the Fernet Branca into a double old fashioned glass with ice, fill the glass up with Cola. Gently stir.
cocktails.name: Fernandito

cocktails.method: Pour all the ingredients, except Champagne, into a shaker. Shake well and strain into a Champagne flute. Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: French 75

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: French Connection

cocktails.garnish: Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: French Martini

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a lemon slice, optional lemon zest.
cocktails.method: Shake all ingredients with ice except soda water. Pour into thin tall Tumbler glass, top with a splash soda water.
cocktails.name: Gin Fizz

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for few seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Golden Dream

cocktails.garnish: Mint leaf (optional)
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for few seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Grasshopper

cocktails.garnish: Orange zest.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Hanky Panky

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Hemingway Special

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a rind of one lemon spiral.
cocktails.method: Pour Cognac and ginger ale directly into a highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. If preferred, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.
cocktails.name: Horse’s Neck

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, or “on the rocks” in a traditional clay or terracotta mug.
cocktails.name: Illegal

cocktails.method: Warm black coffee is poured into a pre-heated Irish coffee glass. Whiskey and at least one teaspoon of sugar is added and stirred until dissolved. Fresh thick chilled cream is carefully poured over the back of a spoon held just above the surface of the coffee. The layer of cream will float on the coffee without mixing. Plain sugar can be replaced with sugar syrup
cocktails.name: Irish Coffee

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a lemon slice and maraschino cherry.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients directly into a highball filled with ice. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: John Collins
cocktails.note: Use ‘Old Tom’ Gin for Tom Collins.

cocktails.method: Pour Crème de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine.
cocktails.name: KIR
cocktails.note: KIR ROYAL - Use Champagne instead of white wine

cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Last word

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with sugar rim around the glass.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Lemon drop Martini

cocktails.garnish: Lemon Slice (Optional)
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: Long Island Ice Tea

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with pineapple spear, mint leaves, and lime peel.
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a double rocks glass or a highball glass.  The Martinique molasses rum used by Trader Vic was not an Agricole rum but a type of “rummy” from molasses.
cocktails.name: Mai-Tai

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a cocktail cherry.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.note: BLACK MANHATTAN - Use Averna amaro instead of sweet vermouth and add a dash of orange bitters.

cocktails.garnish: Half salt rim (Optional)
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass
cocktails.name: Margarita

cocktails.garnish: Lemon zest.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Martinez

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Mary Pickford

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with an orange twist (optional).
cocktails.method: Pour orange juice into a flute glass and gently pour the sparkling wine. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: Mimosa

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a mint sprig.
cocktails.method: In Julep Stainless Steel Cup gently muddle the mint with sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add the Bourbon and stir well until the cup frosts.
cocktails.name: Mint Julep

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with sprigs of mint and slice of lime.
cocktails.method: Mix mint springs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill the glass with ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Light stir to involve all ingredients.
cocktails.name: Mojito

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Monkey Gland

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a lime slice
cocktails.method: In a Mule Cup or rocks glass, combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice and gently stir to involve all ingredients.
cocktails.name: Moscow Mule

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Naked and Famous

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a half orange slice.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients directly into a chilled old fashioned glass filled with ice, Stir gently.
cocktails.name: Negroni

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with lemon or orange zest with cherry.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice. Float the wine on top.
cocktails.name: New York Sour

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with mint springs.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled elegant cocktail glass. Top up with the sparkling wine.
cocktails.name: Old Cuban

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with an orange slice or zest, and a cocktail cherry.
cocktails.method: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitter, add few dashes of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: Old Fashioned

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a slice of lime.
cocktails.method: Poor the tequila into a highball glass, squeeze the lime juice. Add ice and salt, fill up pink grapefruit soda. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: Paloma

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Paper Plane

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Paradise

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with candied ginger.
cocktails.method: Muddle fresh ginger in a shaker and add the remaining ingredients, except for the Islay single malt whiskey. Fill the shaker with ice and shake. Double-strain into a chilled old fashioned glass with ice. Float the single malt whisky on top.
cocktails.name: Penicillin

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a slice of pineapple with a cocktail cherry.
cocktails.method: Blend all the ingredients with ice in an electric blender, pour into a large glass, and serve with straws.
cocktails.name: Pina Colada
cocktails.note: Historically a few drops of fresh lime juice were added to taste. 4 slices of fresh pineapple can be used instead of juice

cocktails.garnish: Few dashes of Amargo bitters on top as an aromatic garnish.
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled goblet glass.
cocktails.name: Pisco Sour

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with orange zest.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients directly in a small tumbler or a typical terracotta glass.
cocktails.name: Planter’s Punch
cocktails.note: Add dilution up to taste, it can be given by water, ice or fresh juices.

cocktails.garnish: Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Porto Flip

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients except soda water in a cocktail shaker with ice, Shake for two minutes, double strain in a glass, pour the drink back in the shaker, and hard shake without ice for one minute. Strain into a highball glass, top up with soda.
cocktails.name: Ramos Fizz
cocktails.note: The drink was invented by Henry Ramos in 1888, at his bar Meyer’s Table d’Hôtel Internationale in New Orleans. The Ramos Fizz was originally shaken for 12 minutes by a crew of 30 bartenders who passed the shaker from one to another.

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with blackberries and optionally a lemon slice as well.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the sparkling wine, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled tall tumbler glass filled with ice, and top up with sparkling wine.
cocktails.name: Russian Spring Punch

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with lemon zest.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: Rusty Nail

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with lemon zest.
cocktails.method: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice in a mixing glass. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, strain the mixed drink into the glass.
cocktails.name: Sazerac
cocktails.note: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, Rye Whiskey substituted Cognac as it became hard to obtain.

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with orange zest and cherry
cocktails.method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
cocktails.name: Sea Breeze

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a half orange slice.
cocktails.method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
cocktails.name: Sex on the Beach

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Sidecar

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with pineapple and maraschino cherry
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into Hurricane glass.
cocktails.name: Singapore Sling

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with mint springs.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Southside
cocktails.note: If egg white is used shake vigorously.

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a red chili pepper
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Spicy Fifty

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.
cocktails.method: Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
cocktails.name: Spritz
cocktails.note: There are other versions of the Spritz that use Campari, Cynar or Select instead of Aperol.

cocktails.garnish: Optional mint leave.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Stinger

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with mint springs and optionally an orange slice as well.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the ginger beer, shake well with ice, Pour unstrained into a Collins glass or in the original S. Bastard mug and top up with ginger beer.
cocktails.name: Suffering Bastard

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with half orange slice or an orange zest
cocktails.method: Pour tequila and orange juice directly into highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the grenadine syrup to create chromatic effect (sunrise), do not stir.
cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Tipperary

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a lime slice.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice.
cocktails.name: Tommy’s Margarita

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Trinidad Sour

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with cherry and lemon zest
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Tuxedo

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with lemon zest and white grapes.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled small tumbler glass filled with ice.
cocktails.name: VE.N.TO
cocktails.note: If desired water can be replaced by chamomile infusion in the honey mix.

cocktails.garnish: Lemon zest
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Vesper

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with orange zest and maraschino cherry.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Vieux Carrè

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a half orange slice and maraschino cherry, optionally use orange zest.
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into cobbler glass. If served “On the rocks”, strain ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice.
cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.note: If egg white is used shake little harder to release and incorporate the foam from the egg white.

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: White Lady

cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.name: Yellow Bird

cocktails.garnish: Garnish with mint leaves.
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into an electric blender with 170 grams of cracked ice. With pulse bottom blend for a few seconds. Serve in a tall tumbler glass.
cocktails.name: Zombie
cocktails.note: Donn’s Mix: 2 parts of fresh yellow grapefruit and 1 part of cinnamon syrup

intro:
Serving up delicious cocktails 
in plain text.
